'''Sugardew Bait''' is used in [[Fishing]]. It can be used to catch [[Anglers]] and [[Axe Marlins]].

The [[formula]] can be bought from [[Loumelat]] of the [[Sumeru Fishing Association]] with {{Item|Medaka|x=3}}.

==Recipe==
{{Recipe
|type         = Crafting
|Harra Fruit  = 1
|Sumeru Rose  = 1
